name: Riddlescape
description:
Riddlescape is a first-person 3D adventure game with full body awareness.
The objective of the game is to survive the many traps that will harm the protagonist while exploring an ancient maya ruin and looking for his lost companions.
The player will be asked to have great reflexes as well as (fast) puzzle solving skills, but, most importantly, a lot of patience since every death means starting all over again.
